alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 20 at 3:07AM MST until February 22 at 6:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...The Southern Black Hills, the Custer County Plains and the Hermosa Foot Hills. * WHEN...From 5 AM Monday to 6 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills
